name: dynamodb-sqrl-store
description: Data store for SQRL using DynamoDb
author: Jason Clark <jason@jjasonclark.com> (https://jjasonclark.com)

scripts.db:create: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=local AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=local AWS_REGION=local aws dynamodb create-table --endpoint http://localhost:8000 --table-name sqrl --attribute-definitions AttributeName=pk,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=pk,KeyType=HASH --billing-mode PAY_PER_REQUEST
